titleStmt.title: Geographie delineated forth in two bookes Containing the sphericall and topicall parts thereof, by Nathanael Carpenter, Fellow of Exceter Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, Nathanael, 1589-1628?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, for Henry Cripps, and are to be sold by Henry Curteyne,

notesStmt.note: "Geographie the second booke" has separate dated title page, pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
